DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether supplementation certain polyunsaturated fatty acid help development behavior child bear preterm .
DOC.brief_title: Preemie Tots : A Pilot Study Understand Effects Prematurity Toddlerhood
DOC.criteria: 1 . Child bear less equal 29 complete week ' gestation ; 2 . Child 18 month , 0 day 38 month , 30 day old chronological age ; 3 . Child admit NICU and/or Neonatology Clinic follow visit schedule . 4 . Child show autistic symptom ; 5 . Child 5th 95th percentile ( per WHO growth chart ) weight his/her recent hospital visit ; 6 . English spoken home , demonstrate ability communicate English wellenough understand study , inform consent , study questionnaire ; 7 . Have inform consent file . 1 . Consume LCPUFA supplement drop , chew , powder , Pediasure , fatty fish 2x per week ; 2 . Unable tolerate venipuncture ; 3 . Any major malformation would preclude participation ; 4 . Cerebral Palsy ( quadriparesis ) ; 5 . Deafness ; 6 . Blindness ; 7 . Bleeding disorder ; 8 . Type I diabetes ; 9 . Fragile X Syndrome , Rett Syndrome , Angleman Syndrome , Tuberous Sclerosis ; 10 . Non febrile seizure last month without clear resolve etiology ; 11 . Feeding problem may inhibit full participation ; 12 . Known fish allergy ; 13 . Known canola/rapeseed allergy sensitivity ; 14 . Recorded score < 70 Bayley Cognitive Section within past year .
